resources.string: MindShield uses accessibility services to monitor app usage and detect distractions to help you stay focused.
MindShield uses accessibility services to analyze content in YouTube and Chrome to detect entertainment content and help you stay productive.
MindShield uses accessibility services to intelligently analyze content in YouTube and browsers to distinguish between productive and distracting content, helping you stay focused.
MindShield uses accessibility services to monitor app usage and enforce time limits to help you manage your screen time effectively.
